powsolver
A LynxChan bypass proof-of-work solver in Java, for users that don't run JS in their browser.
You need to have Java installed in order to execute this program. I recommend installing the open source version (OpenJDK).
On Debian/Ubuntu: sudo apt-get install openjdk-11-jre
On CentOS: sudo yum install java-latest-openjdk

To solve your LynxChan bypass validation, run PoWSolver.jar and give the string the site will show you as the only parameter.
Ex: java -jar PoWSolver.jar 

After a while, the program will print your code and exit. Just input this code on the site and submit for validation.
